channel.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
channel.description:
[details="Kings/Pretender"] >[color=#0000FF]**The Blue Dragon King**[/color] >**Good Tenacity** (Passive) - Immune to occupation and redirection, can talk in trial, If starting GK the court can not vote the next day if executed, you may only guard yourself twice. > >**The Royal Finger (Passive)** - You're vote Counts twice. > >**Grand Trial (Day)** > >**Court Chambers (Day)** - Order two players to talk to you during this night, They will not meet up with faction members if a faction member but still can use normal night actions. - 2 Uses. (Prince will not jail anyone) (*Starting King only). > >**Improved Guards! (Night)** - Protect someone or yourself. - 4 Uses. (*Elected King -1 Charge). > > >**Nobility Status (Night)** - Make a player votes Doubled upon becoming king stacks with royal blood - 1 Use. (*Elected King only)
>**The [color=#8000FF]Unseen[/color]/[color=#BF0000]Cult[/color] King** >**Tenacity (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection, Can talk during trial. > >**The Royal Finger (Passive)** -You're vote Counts twice. > >**Grand Trial (Day)** - Force a player into Trial > >**Court Chambers (Day)** - Order two players to talk to you during this night, They will not meet up with faction members if a faction member but still can use normal night actions. - 2 Uses. (Prince will not jail anyone) (*Starting King only). > >**Improved Guards! (Night)** - Protect someone or yourself. - 4 Uses. (*Elected King -1 Charge). > >**Close Allies (Night)** - Close Allies (Night) - Discover if a player is Apart of your faction if so which class - 3 uses.
>[color=#BFBFBF]**Neutral King**[/color] >**Tenacity (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection, Can talk during trial. > >**The Royal Finger (Passive)** - You're vote Counts twice. > >**Grand Trial (Day)** - Force a player into Trial > >**Improved Guards! (Night)** - Protect someone or yourself - 3 Uses. > >Goal: Survive until the end of the game. (Crowned from Alchemist, Mercenary and Inquisitor).
>[color=#BFBFBF]**Psycho King**[/color] >**Deadly Tenacity (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection, Death, Bleeding, can talk in trial. > >**The Royal Finger (Passive)** - You're vote Counts twice. > >**Grand Trial (Day)** - Force a player into Trial > >**Pressure (Day)** - Force a player to vote another. > >**Order Execution (Night)** - Kill a Player, doesn't count as visiting - Infinite. > >**Fetal Guards (Night)** - Kill someone Bypassing everything, Doesn't count as visiting - 2 Uses. > >Goal: Kill all members of the main factions in order to win.
>[color=#BFBFBF]**Spiteful King**[/color] >**Tenacity (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection, Can talk during trial. > >**The Royal Finger (Passive)** - You're vote Counts twice. > >**Grand Trial (Day)** - Force a player into Trial > >**Improved Guards!(Night)** - Protect someone or yourself - 3 Uses. > >Goal: Defeat The **[color=#0000FF]Blue Dragon[/color]** Faction. (Crowned from Sellsword, Pretender, Fool and Scorned).
>[color=#BFBFBF]**Pretender Neutral Social**[/color] >**Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes for you becoming king will be doubled. > >**Regret (Passive)** - You'll Commit suicide if you can no longer win > >**Ballot Mix (Day)** - Reverse the vote of a player - 2 Uses. > >**Manipulate (Day)** - Force a player to vote another - 2 Uses. > >**Rumour (Night)** - Listen to a players feedback making Investigative See BD as Unseen/Cult, Neutrals/Cult/Unseen as BD. (Princess flirts work like normal frame). - Infinite. > >**Copycat (Night)** - You'll use the ability of the first player into the second, Second target abilities will target yourself, You can't copy converts. - 2 Uses.
>Goal: Don't allow more then 2-Non-Blue Dragon players be executed, Excluding Fool/Yourself.
[/details]
All King Change, Only king and killer will know if their protection target was attacked.
Small Changes Small Change: Noble Twin - Removed. Pretender Is Incompatible with BD.

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I didn’t defend pretender and I’m not about to

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Yeah King with 6 guards that he could self target was dumb.

I just don’t really like pretender as a solution to king out right counters are dumb

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
His survivability was already lowered which I approve of.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Soulshade55r:

But I don’t think it’s good to make it near impossible to survive as king

I know. It’s a balance you have to strike.

The idea is that ideally the King would die at around the midpoint of the game most of the time for one reason or another.

That doesn’t mean make him completely helpless, in fact right now he only has 2 guards, which is likely about the right number for those purposes.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
I do

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
I personally don’t mind elected Kings having majority either as they aren’t random.

But I don’t think it’s good to make it near impossible to survive as king

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I don’t think that would be very good.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
I think a good change would be were all supports/Knights can’t target the same person in a row might be a heavy nerf to bd though

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Ideally of course you would have something else that perfectly negates the swing, for example the queen suggestion I posted awhile ago (not in that exact form, but something to the same effect), but that doesn’t exist right now so King is going to be swingy no matter what.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Regardless, in the situation of a starting King in this late stage of the game you will always end up with a non-balance issue of some kind, either swing because King RNG (not as bad as you would think, the swing is there either way and competent scum reading means it has counterplay) or the game suddenly coming to a halt because of a temporary stalemate.

Personally, due to thinks like the Elected King mechanics I consider it to be the lesser of 2 evils.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
That’s why I’ve been supporting lowering his survivability. The best games are the ones with an elected King.

Pretender King doesn’t count.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
The issue is Kings RNG. and shouldn’t be a tie breaker.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Using point as a tiebreaker for situations where otherwise a vote would be impossible for both sides. That kind of situation while not a balance issue, really kills the flow of the game.

The fact that the King makes these situations incredibly rare where otherwise (for example in ToS) they would happen all the time is one of my favorite aspects of the King.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Of what?

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Kinda defeats the whole point

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
ok I won’t be silly but kings ability still disabled.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
That’s silly. Don’t do that.

Double vote is best used as a tie breaker when 2 factions are of equal numbers.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
well my remake of kang

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
King gets a double vote though currently including Exe/Pardon.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Soulshade55r:

King having majority in 1v2’s would be a bad thing, so the passive disables when their are less then 5 players alive.

Right but he doesn’t.

He can only get majority in a 2v2/1v1, otherwise trials mean he can’t cheese a lynch when he’s outnumbered.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
I feel like the slight complication is needed in terms of balancing king.

King having majority in 1v2’s would be a bad thing, so the passive disables when their are less then 5 players alive.

Read full topic

item.title: Kings and Pretender reworks
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
The Royal Finger (Passive) - You’re vote Counts twice unless their are less then 5 players alive.

I like the general direction you are proposing but I always will hate arbitrary rules. I don’t like MM being invisible for only 3 nights either, for instance.

It creates special cases that have to be considered in deductions that complicates them and makes them tedious

Read full topic

item.description:
A slight change to pret will be a Fool execute won’t count either.
